Sequence Information.Peptide Name: RaCa-1 (RaCa1; natural AMPs like, Palustrin, frog, amphibians, animals, XXU, 1S=S; UCSS1)
Sequence Information.Source: AI predicted, machine learning predicted, American Bullfrog,Rana catesbeiana(RaCa, preferred);Lithobates catesbeiana, North America

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (87.1%) toPalustrin-CaGRAVY: 0.271; Mol form: C146H250N36O41S2; Mol Wt: 3242.926; molar extinction coefficient: 125.Activity: Active against Gram+ S.aureus ATCC 6538P (MIC>2560 ug/ml), S. pyogenes (MIC 79 ug/ml), Gram- P.aeruginosa ATCC 10148 (MIC>2560 ug/ml), E. coli ATCC 9723H or 25922 or MDR CPO-NDM (MIC 10-39 ug/ml). Updated 6/2024
Literature Information.Author: Li C, Sutherland D, Hammond SA, Yang C, Taho F, Bergman L, Houston S, Warren RL, Wong T, Hoang LMN, Cameron CE, Helbing CC, Birol I. 2022
Literature Information.Title: AMPlify: attentive deep learning model for discovery of novel antimicrobial peptides effective against WHO priority pathogens
